termsModal.title: Terms of Service
termsModal.introduction:
These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as "Terms") set forth the conditions for using all features provided by Charactier (hereinafter referred to as "the Service").
Users shall use the Service upon agreeing to these Terms.

article1.title: Article 1 (Definitions)
article1.content1: "Talk Tickets" refers to digital points required for sending chats with characters.
article1.content2: "Premium Characters" refers to characters that are unlocked by paying an additional fee.

article2.title: Article 2 (Account)
article2.item1: Please enter the latest and accurate information when registering.
article2.item2: Creating multiple accounts by the same person is prohibited.

article3.title: Article 3 (Prohibited Activities)
article3.item1: Acts that violate laws and public order and morals
article3.item2: Acts that infringe on the rights of third parties
article3.item3: Unauthorized reproduction or commercial use of AI-generated responses
article3.item4: Unauthorized access such as reverse engineering or scraping

article4.title: Article 4 (Talk Tickets)
article4.item1: Users can purchase Talk Tickets through Stripe payment.
article4.item2: Talk Tickets cannot be transferred, exchanged for cash, or refunded.
article4.item3: Talk Ticket balance is managed in accordance with prepaid payment instruments (Payment Services Act).

article5.title: Article 5 (Premium Characters)
article5.item1: Users can unlock Premium Characters by paying the specified fee.
article5.item2: After unlocking, conversations are possible by consuming Talk Tickets without additional charges.
article5.item3: Unlock rights cannot be transferred, exchanged for cash, or refunded.

article6.title: Article 6 (Prohibited Activities)
article6.intro: Users shall not engage in the following activities:
article6.item1: (1) Activities that violate laws or public order and morals
article6.item2: (2) Activities that infringe on third-party intellectual property rights
article6.item3: (3) Posting excessively violent, sexual, or discriminatory content
article6.item4: (4) Unauthorized access, reverse engineering, or similar activities
article6.item5: (5) Activities that interfere with the operation of the Service

article7.title: Article 7 (Fees and Refunds)
article7.item1: Payment method is credit card payment (Stripe).
article7.item2: Due to the nature of digital goods, purchased Talk Tickets and Premium Character fees will not be refunded for any reason.
article7.item3: If a monthly plan is introduced, users must cancel from My Page before the renewal date.

article8.title: Article 8 (Disclaimer and Damages)
article8.item1: The Service assumes no responsibility when unable to provide services due to natural disasters, network failures, or other force majeure.
article8.item2: If the Service's negligence is minor, the Service is not responsible for damages incurred by users arising from or related to use.
article8.item3: Even if the Service is liable, compensation is limited to the total amount paid by the user to the Service in the past 12 months.

article9.title: Article 9 (Changes to Terms)
article9.content:
The Service may change these Terms as necessary.
Revised Terms take effect when posted on this page.

article10.title: Article 10 (Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability)
article10.content: The Service is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind.
article10.content1: The Service is provided as-is. The Office does not guarantee operational reliability or fitness for purpose.
article10.content2: The Office does not intervene in disputes between users or with third parties and assumes no responsibility.
article10.content3: Purchased tokens and characters cannot be refunded for any reason.

article11.title: Article 11 (Damages)
article11.content: Except in cases of intentional misconduct or gross negligence by the Office, the Office's liability is limited to the total amount paid by the user to the Office in the past 12 months.

article12.title: Article 12 (Changes to Terms)
article12.content: These Terms may be revised as necessary. We will notify changes on this site at least 30 days before the effective date. Use after revision constitutes agreement to the new terms.

article13.title: Article 13 (Governing Law and Jurisdiction)
article13.content: These Terms are governed by Japanese law, and the Yokohama District Court shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

article14.title: Article 14 (Refunds and Cancellations)
article14.item1: Digital products such as tokens and characters purchased by users on this service cannot be cancelled or refunded for customer convenience.
article14.item2: In cases of duplicate charges or other payment defects caused by us, we will promptly refund or compensate the equivalent amount after investigation.

article15.title: Article 15 (Chargebacks)
article15.item1: If a user files a dispute with their credit card company and chargeback fees are incurred by us, the user shall bear such fees and administrative charges.
article15.item2: We may suspend the user's account until the fees mentioned in the preceding paragraph are paid.

privacyModal.title: Privacy Policy
privacyModal.introduction:
Charactier (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") establishes the following Privacy Policy
(hereinafter referred to as "this Policy") to properly handle users' personal information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: Name, email address, password, payment information, IP address, cookie ID, AI input content, etc.
section1.item2: Payment information (collected through Stripe; card numbers are not stored by the Service)
section1.item4: Chat content and input prompts to AI

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Use
section2.item2: (2) Token balance management and payment processing
section2.item5: (5) Responding to violations of terms of service
section2.item6: (6) Service improvement and marketing (after statistical processing and anonymization)

section3.title: 3. External Transmission and Third-Party Provision
section3.description: We send data to the following services (items sent in parentheses).
section3.item2: ・Stripe (payment processing: email address, payment amount, IP)
section3.item3: ・Google Analytics (usage analysis: Cookie ID, pages viewed)
section3.note: We do not provide to third parties without consent except as required by law.

ga4.name: Google Analytics 4
ga4.info: Cookies (_ga, etc.), IP address, page URLs

stripe.name: Stripe
stripe.info: Payment amount, email address, payment tokens, etc.

optOut.title: Opt-out Method
optOut.description:
GA4 tracking can be disabled using the Google Analytics Opt-out Add-on.
Other cookies can be deleted/rejected through browser settings.

section4.title: 4. Use of Cookies, etc.
section4.content: This site uses cookies for session management and behavior analysis. You can disable cookies in your browser, but some features may be limited. Analytics cookies can be rejected at any time from the 'Cookie Settings' banner at the bottom of the screen.
section4.description: Personal information collected will not be provided to third parties except in the following cases:
section4.item3: When providing to Stripe for payment processing

section5.title: 5. Security Management Measures
section5.item1: Organizational security: Minimization of access rights, bi-annual log audits
section5.item2: Technical security: DB encryption with AES-256-GCM, WAF and rate limiting operations
section5.item3: Physical security: Cloud data center access control, geographically redundant backups

section6.title: 6. Requests for Disclosure, Correction, or Deletion
section6.content: Users can request disclosure of their personal information based on the Personal Information Protection Act.

section7.title: 7. GDPR Additional Provisions
section7.content: We process personal data based on contract performance (GDPR Art.6(1)(b)) and legitimate interests (Art.6(1)(f)) as legal grounds. EU users can request data portability and processing suspension. They have the right to file complaints with supervisory authorities.

section9.title: 9. Retention Period
section9.content: Personal information collected will be deleted or anonymized within (a) 30 days after user withdrawal, and chat history within 90 days after last access. Unless otherwise required by law, data will not be retained for more than 5 years.

section11.title: 11. Additional Rights under GDPR
section11.content: EU users can exercise rights of access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection regarding personal data held by us. Please contact support@charactier-ai.com for requests. Users also have the right to lodge complaints with supervisory authorities.
